content:
"An innovation is one of those things that society looks at & says, if we make this part of the way we live and work, it will change the way we live and work" - Dean Kamen

Stanford Court offers a delightful blend of escape & access, of innovation & creativity, a perfect home away from home. 

To join our Corporate Preferred Program or for additional information, complete the contact form below.
